page.title: 03Mr Fox the Arable Farmer.
page.content: Mr.Fox farms the land at Puttock's End which is between Anstey and Brent Pelham. He has{165 acres}of land and grows{Wheat,Barley,Beans}and{Hay.}He finds harvest the most difficult time because of the long hours and dust. He has{4 Ford tractors.}He comes from a farming family, his father has farmed for{60 years.}Had he not followed in his father's footsteps he would have liked to have been a{pilot.}The history of his land goes back to{ {Norman}times when the land was given to a{Knight, Sir Richard de Puttock} for services to the{King.}Mr. Fox begins his day at 8:30am in the spring and 6:00am during harvest. He finishes at 6:00pm in the spring and 10:00pm at harvest time. His day's work can include ploughing, sowing, bailing, hedge trimming, spraying and harvesting.
